node.title: The best places to work in 2021, ranked
node.description: Glassdoor has ranked large employers across the US... and a lot of the big tech companies aren't at the top
node.content: ["As more companies ponder a return to their offices, it's worth noting that some offices \u2014 and the people who run them \u2014 are more beloved than others.", "Human resources technology and analysis company Glassdoor has compiled a\u00a0list of the best companies to work for in 2021, using survey data from more than 100 million employee reviews. Perhaps surprisingly, some of America's most buzzed-about tech companies, including Netflix, Snapchat and Twitter, didn't make the top 50.\u00a0", "Here's a countdown of the companies that did."]
